title: One-nil to the Arsenal
author: VD
content_html:
Thierry Henry was fantastic. Beats four Real Madrid defenders, then slips the ball across the face of goal and past the keeper, and Arsenal has an away win at the Bernabau. The Gunners may be out of the Premiership, but they’re certainly off to a great start in Europe.

As for my other team, Milan, at least they didn’t lose to Bryan Munich.
content_text:
Thierry Henry was fantastic.  Beats four Real Madrid defenders, then slips the ball across the face of goal and past the keeper, and Arsenal has an away win at the Bernabau.  The Gunners may be out of the Premiership, but they’re certainly off to a great start in Europe.
As for my other team, Milan, at least they didn’t lose to Bryan Munich.
